data.title: Shonda Rhimes
data.meta_description: #96 Shonda Rhimes on the 2023 America's Self-Made Women - Shonda Rhimes is the creator of ABC hits like Grey's Anatomy and Scandal, which brought in more
data.text:
Shonda Rimes Delivers Inclusive Leadership Lessons For Us To Emulate

Shonda Rimes, acclaimed TV producer, highlights inclusivity in storytelling and casting. Rimes' diverse projects, like Bridgerton, exemplify inclusive leadership.

'Bridgerton' Season 3 Was Most-Streamed Netflix Show Last Week With 45 Million Views

All three seasons of Shonda Rhimes’ “Bridgerton” made it onto this week’s Top 10 most-watched list.

Here Are The 15 Richest Women Celebrities In America

How performers like Taylor Swift, Rihanna, Beyoncé Knowles and newcomer Shonda Rhimes not only made bank this past year but grabbed headlines and broke records along the way.

America’s Richest Self-Made Women 2023: New Faces And Record-High Numbers

Eight newcomers including Bridgerton and Grey’s Anatomy creator Shonda Rhimes join such standouts as Taylor Swift and Sheryl Sandberg among the nation’s 100 most successful female entrepreneurs, executives and entertainers.

Over 400 TV Writers And Showrunners Demand Abortion Protections From Major Studios, Report Says

The demands were sent to Netflix, Disney and other major companies by TV industry heavyweights including Mindy Kaling, Shonda Rhimes, Chelsea Handler, Amy Schumer and Amy Sherman-Palladino.

Shonda Rhimes, Jimmy Kimmel Among 200 Hollywood Creators Pledging To Show Gun Safety On-Screen

Over 200 directors, producers, actors and other film and TV professionals signed an open letter Monday from gun violence prevention group Brady pledging to model responsible gun safety measures on-screen.

Shonda Rhimes, Jimmy Kimmel Among 200 Hollywood Creators Pledging To Show Gun Safety On-Screen

Signers of the open letter called for showing responsible gun storage and limiting the number of scenes with children and guns.

Netflix Increases Shonda Rhimes $100 Million Deal For A Bigger Stake In Culture

Netflix has huge plans with its original content offerings in hopes of wading deeper into diverse audiences by increasing its deal with showrunner legend Shonda Rhimes. The multiyear deal includes new media formats beyond TV and movies, and into gaming, merchandise, virtual reality and live events.

How Shonda Rhimes Increased Her Earnings Power With Shondaland

Shonda Rhimes spent the first 12 years of her TV career contributing to Disney’s empire. Now she’s building her own.

Shonda Rhimes Does Things The Shondaland Way, Thanks To Groundbreaking Netflix Deal

Shonda Rhimes spent the first 12 years of her TV career contributing to Disney’s empire. Now she’s building her own.

‘Bridgerton’ Women Dish On Wigs, Costumes, Intimacy Coordinator And Shonda Rhimes

The female stars of Netflix’s Bridgerton, Netflix’s escapist hit of the 2020 holiday season—determined debutante Daphne Bridgerton (Phoebe Dynevor); seemingly innocent Penelope Featherington (Nicola Coughlan); sharp-tongued grand dame Lady Danbury (Adjoa Andoh); and frustrated feminist Eloise Bri...

‘Bridgerton’ Makes History On Netflix With 82 Million Viewers; $100 Million Shonda Rhimes Gamble Pays Off

Rhimes is no stranger to major series success.

Netflix Has Another Hit In Shonda Rhimes’ Smashing ‘Bridgerton’ Debut

Shonda Rhimes' first Netflix show, 'Bridgerton,' has been a huge initial success, the streamer said, watched by 63 million households in its first four weeks. It was No. 1 in 76 countries.

Laverne Cox Launches Her First Podcast Series With Shonda Rhimes’ Shondaland Audio

Laverne Cox launches her first podcast, a weekly series from Shonda Rhimes’ Shondaland Audio and iHeartMedia.

Shonda Rhimes Partners Up With Peloton For ‘Year Of Yes: Peloton X Shonda Rhimes’

Award-winning Executive Producer and Peloton Member Shonda Rhimes is teaming up with Peloton to create an 8-week “Year of Yes” class collection, and she’s inviting Peloton Members as well as her fans to come along with her.
